title: Console Lines
alt: If I get a Wii, it will be the first game console I've owned.
transcript:
Fans turning away latecomers to all-night game console campouts:
[Two different lines presumably leading to a video game store are shown. In the line labeled Sony/Microsoft:]
Cueball: The line is full, asshole! Get off!
[And in the one labeled Nintendo:]
Cueball: I'm so sorry, all the consoles are spoken for.
Cueball: Do... Do you want a hug?
